text: Clifford Allan Redin Savory (born 15 September 1935) is a Zimbabwean ecologist and livestock farmer. He is the president and co-founder of the Savory Institute. His works focuses on holistic management"Holistic Land Management: Key to Global Stability" by Terry Waghorn. Forbes. 20 December 2012. for resources. His controversial ideas include that livestock are the only ones that can limit desertification. Prince Charles called him "a remarkable ecologist". ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Ecologists Category:Zimbabwean people
